data.title: Best Marisco in Town
data.text: Best Mariscos in Fontana. and the Micheladas are no joke!! the food is really good. the only problem is that thy take a long time to bring out the food. everything is freshly made

data.title: Usually very good
data.text: Usually very good, because the food is fresh and delicious, a very casual authentic seafood Mexican eatery, I love the shrimp cocktail, it is a Mexican style preparation with medium to large size shrimps about 15 to 20 in a clam sauce with tomato  clam juice, similar to clamato, perhaps? It has chopped onions, cilantro, cucumbers, served with saltines or Mexican tortilla tostadas plain. The campechana is the shrimp cocktail with squid, scallops, abulon, it is a must if you like seafood and Mexican simply delicioso!!! Its a small hole in the wall and the area looks shady but is safe, as a local I visit here 3-8 times a year. Stop by it is worth it.
